snippet.title: Remothered: Tormented Fathers - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The announcement trailer for "Remothered: Tormented Fathers", the first chapter of the highly-anticipated survival horror saga conceived and directed by Chris Darril. Coming out via Steam on January 30th and next on PS4 and XboxOne! 

Visit this web page to join the game's beta » http://bit.ly/tormented-fathers-preview
